entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 13. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning in the evening and ending after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
